metadata.title: CVE-2015-2180 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The DBMail driver in the Password plugin in Roundcube before 1.1.0 allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters inthe password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2180` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1').
